info.description: This is the API for Singularity, a tool for large-scale clients with PB-scale data onboarding to Filecoin network.
info.title: Singularity API

post.summary: Register a CAR file piece with a dataset
Add a source to a dataset

delete.summary: Remove a source from a dataset

get.summary: List all sources for a dataset
List all wallets of a dataset.

post.summary: Associate a new wallet with a dataset

delete.summary: Remove an associated wallet from a dataset
